sentences.sentence: And so she ran on, till I dropped endeavouring to convince her of her mistake.
sentences.translation: 她就这样滔滔不绝地说着，到后来我只好放弃了使她觉悟到她的错误的努力。

sentences.sentence: Mr Earnshaw has a mind to shoot you, if you persist in endeavouring to enter.''
sentences.translation: ‘如果你坚持要进来，恩萧先生打算拿枪崩你。’

sentences.sentence: I was endeavouring to gather resolution for entering and taking possession, when my fool of a guide announced, 'This here is t' master's.
sentences.translation: 我正想下决心进去住下来，这时我的笨蛋向导宣布：“这儿是主人的。”
